entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as being with Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is guiding Harry through a mysterious place.

entities.name: lake
entities.description: A great black lake that Harry and Dumbledore are standing on the edge of.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: An object used by wizards to cast spells, mentioned as being lit by both Harry and Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Harry is following closely behind Dumbledore as they walk around the lake.
Harry and Dumbledore are standing on the edge of the lake.
Dumbledore is holding a wand, which he uses to light his way.
Harry is also holding a wand, which he uses to light his way.
